SoftwareType.Name: DRM Software
SoftwareType.Description: Digital rights management software that reduces piracy by making your software unusable.

Feature.Name: Serial Codes
Feature.Description: Force users to prove they purchesed the product by using a unique one-time use serial code.

Feature.Name: EULA
Feature.Description: By creating a 100 page document explaining exactly how users may use the software they just purchesed, one might disuade people from hacking or modifying the software for personal gain...thats the idea anyways.

Feature.Name: Multiple Downloads
Feature.Description: Finally allow the user to download products multiple times as they were able to before DRM.

Feature.Name: Digital Library
Feature.Description: Permanantly associate a game with a user's account so they can never lose, or resell, a product.

Feature.Name: Trojan Horse
Feature.Description: Embed a virus in products that only activates if a user pirates your software. Its legal, we checked.
